interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SAISZE Jaw Exerciser, Facial Fat Burner Double Chin Reducer Eliminator for Jawline Shaper, Neck Muscle Training Helps Face Slimming for Men Women (Blue)
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Store: SAISZE
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 4.69 x 1.77 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: I do not think I will continue to use this gadget. For one, like others have said, it is larger than it appears. It is kind of hard to get into my mouth and biting it is not really ergonomic. I followed the directions in the description and boiled it so that when I bit down, the clear bits became an impression of my teeth. However, I did not find that to be much help later on. I used this a couple of times and while I did find my jaw feeling sore afterwards, I do not feel comfortable using it for the long term. My jaw is not in good alignment (something I need surgery for but can't afford) so I got this with hopes that it could help support my jaw and keep it from getting worse. I also have a hard time with jaw discomfort from teeth grinding and my dentist said that exercises can help alleviate that issue. Due to the large size and ill-fit, I fear that it could do more damage to my jaw and bite than help. I think overall this is a lost cause for me but maybe someone else will have better luck.
Review Title: Not really a fan
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mary Kay Makeup Finishing Spray by Skindinävia
Mary Kay
{'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'Mary Kay', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 5 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
I loved how this made my makeup look but I don't feel like it made much of difference in longevity. And I am not sure my skin even likes this product because the past few times I have applied it, I would get one or two breakouts. It could be related to something else but the longer I go without this product, the few the problems I have. I prefer the skindinavia lines but don't take my word for it, this product could work for you!

I have been using this for so long and I like it but I do not know if I will continue to repurchase because I think my body has stopped responding to it. If I was in a pinch and needed something asap, I would go back to this because I know it but currently I am trying other things to see if they compare.

Garnier Fructis Volume Extend Instant Bodifier Dry Shampoo 3.40 oz (Pack of 2)
Garnier
{'Brand': 'Garnier', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.7 x 1.8 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '603084294954'}
I like this dry shampoo because it feels so light in my hair, it doesn’t feel sticky or tough. I do not feel it gives my hair volume but it does well in cancelling excess oils and smelling good. I would repurchase but I would have preferred more volume (hence my four stars).
Good, not perfect for me.
Dr. Denese Cannabis Sativa Super Serum with Soothing Calming Organic Cold-Pressed Hemp Oil, Ginger, Bisabolol, Ceramides - Reduce Look of Wrinkles, Moisturize & Improved Tightness - Cruelty-Free - 2oz
Dr. Denese
{'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Dr. Denese', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 2.6 x 1.7 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'}
After using this for several days now, I am officially in love with this. This serum has calmed my redness by miles, my blemishes don't last a long, and this stuff absorbs lightning fast. It feels so smooth, soft (like velvet), and the texture is thin and easy to work with. There is no smell and a little goes a long way. I definitely plan to keep this serum as a repeat staple in my routine.
Very nice
Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz
Zeitun
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'}
I like this coffee scrub! The ingredients are simple, yet powerful. It smells like a good, spiced coffee dessert with the cinnamon and ginger. As with any coffee scrub, you have to use this consistently to see any kind of results. I find that this improves my skin softness and shaving is a dream after I use this scrub. Overall a great scrub!
Nice

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup and Hair Care Enthusiast**: Strong interest in makeup application and hair care products, focusing on aesthetics and presentation.

- **Preference for Spray Products**: Enjoys lightweight, easy-to-apply spray formulas, emphasizing practicality and convenience.

- **Sensitive Skin and Scalp**: Experiences breakouts with certain makeup and has sensitive reactions to hair products, leading to careful ingredient scrutiny and cautious experimentation with new items.

- **Brand Loyalty and Trust**: Favors established brands with trusted reputations, reflecting a strong reliance on product efficacy.

- **Critical Yet Appreciative**: Values essential benefits of products but remains critical of their performance, resulting in thorough evaluations.

- **Cautious Experimentation with New Products**: Open to trying new items if they provide proven health benefits, balancing exploration with familiar favorites.

- **Positive Experiences with High-Performance Products**: Recently found success with an exfoliating body scrub that offered effective simplicity and notable benefits.

- **Focus on Functionality**: Seeks improved performance outcomes in beauty products, underscoring high usability and results standards.

- **Exploration Beyond Core Interests**: Recently attempted a facial exercise gadget aimed at jawline enhancement, but encountered discomfort due to size and fit issues, leading to reluctance for continued use. This reflects a cautious approach to new tools that influence health and aesthetics, highlighting an awareness of physical limitations.

Overall, the user embodies a thoughtful approach to beauty and wellness, valuing effective solutions while carefully considering their health and comfort.
